Title: Directs the state comptroller to conduct an audit of the department of financial services to ensure compliance with federal and state requirements
Summary: Directs the state comptroller to conduct an audit of the department of financial services to ensure the agency is meeting its responsibility to evaluate and assess insurer compliance with federal and state mental health and substance use disorder parity requirements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing the state comptroller to conduct an audit of the department of financial services to ensure the agency is meeting its responsibility to evaluate and assess insurer compliance with federal and state mental health and substance use disorder parity requirements
